name: snelpw

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)))

-| wb(wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wss(csn(c0), c1))
-| wb(wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wss(csn(c0), c1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

-| wb(wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c0), c1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(c0), cpw(c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: A singleton of a set belongs to the power class of a class containing the set. (Contributed by NM, 1-Apr-1998.)
